pageProduct.name: Wagner Professional Probiotics 30 Vegetarian Modified Release Capsules
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Probiotics

Warnings

Do not use if cap ring or seal under cap is broken or missing. CONTAINS NO: Wheat, gluten, yeast, egg, artificial flavours or preservatives.

Common Uses

Probiotics contains a combination of 8 strains of beneficial bacteria, providing a high potency 60 Billion CFU per modified release capsule. Probiotics support healthy immune system function, maintain gastrointestinal system health and support beneficial intestinal flora. Probiotics will also help restore good gut flora after antibiotic use.

Ingredients

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Each modified release capsule contains Lactobacillus paracasei 7 billion CFU Lactobacillus salivarius ssp salivarius 5 billion CFU Bifidobacterium breve 2.5 billion CFU Lactobacillus plantarum 8.5 billion CFU Lactobacillus casei 15 billion CFU Bifidobacterium animalis ssp lactis 7 billion CFU Lactobacillus acidophilus 10 billion CFU Lactobacillus rhamnosus 5 billion CFU Total Probiotics 60 billion CFU

Directions

RECOMMENDED DOSAGE: Adults: Take 1 capsule with water daily or take 2 capsules with water daily 2 hours before or after antibiotics. Or as directed by your healthcare professional.
